subject: Medicine
title: The Hotel Maid Study
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: The Hotel Maid Study.

hook.text: Hotel maids exercise all day but rarely think of it that way.

buildup.text: Researchers told half the maids their work counted as exercise.

discovery.text: Four weeks later, that group lost weight and blood pressure.

twist.text: The other group, doing identical work, showed no change.

climax.text: Simply knowing they were exercising changed their bodies.

punchline.text: Awareness turned work into a workout.

quiz.question: What changed for maids told their work was exercise?
options: They lost weight and lowered blood pressure
